abstract.p: Correction of July 28 article about review of 1993 slaying of Mexican cardinal, Juan Jesus Posadas Ocampo, which referred incorrectly to conclusions of two bishops; bishops, unlike some Roman Catholic leaders, shared view of prosecutors that killing occurred when drug traffickers mistook him for rival and was not intentional

block.p: An article on July 28 about a two-year review of the slaying of a Mexican cardinal in 1993 referred incorrectly to the conclusions of two bishops who took part in the investigation. Unlike some Roman Catholic leaders, the two bishops shared the view of prosecutors that the killing of the cardinal, Juan Jesus Posadas Ocampo, occurred when drug traffickers mistook him for a rival, and was not intentional.
